doc:
Drama_Centre_London http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drama_Centre_London 0 Drama Centre London (often abbreviated as Drama Centre) is a British drama school in King's Cross, London, where it recently moved after a major reshaping of the university. The school is part of Central Saint Martins, a constituent college of the University of the Arts London.It is a member of the Federation of Drama Schools.The school offers BA (Hons) and MA acting courses. Drama Centre London (often abbreviated as Drama Centre) is a British drama school in King's Cross, London, where it recently moved after a major reshaping of the university. The school is part of Central Saint Martins, a constituent college of the University of the Arts London.It is a member of the Federation of Drama Schools.The school offers BA (Hons) and MA acting courses.
